name: Emoji Market
description:
Help Max get the last roll of toilet paper to save his confinement! Make your way through a supermarket full of emoji, ready to fight.

Max will only have a few randomly selected items at the beginning of the aisle to defend himself.

Move : ZQSD

Shoot: Space 

Items: 

Bread: Strike in front of you

Anvil: Crushes enemies in front of you

Balloon : Bounces when touching the ground

Banana : Throws the banana like a boomerang

Knife : Goes in a straight line quickly

Tornado : Moves in a zigzag

Sauce : Throws far away. 

Team : 

Designers : 

Tom BECKER, Juliano STANISLAS

Programers : 

Luca SCHIFANO, Paul PUTEGNAT, Raphael MENAL-FUCHS

Artist :

Alice BRAYER

Link to the RoockieJam Page : https://posly.itch.io/rookie-jam-2020
